    • 3r1sn's Delight - Errolson Wu

Workstation

ErlsnWu Dec 18, 2023

It's also my entertainment desktop.
Specs :
Motherboard : MSI MEG Z790 GODLIKE. It's overkill, of course. The reason I chose this motherboard is because I wanna have some fun with it. :P
CPU : Intel Core i9-13900KF. I was considering AMD Ryzen/Threadripper, but after evaluating the applications I use, I eventually chose Intel
GPU : MSI 4090 Gaming Trio. For training some Models.
RAM : G.Skill Trident Z5 32GB\(\times\)2. For heavy load.
PSU : MSI MEG Ai1300P. For future upgrades and 4090.
SSD : Solidigm P44 Pro 1TB\(\times\)2 and 2TB\(\times\)2. Two 1TB drives, one for Ubuntu and one for Windows, and each OS has a 2TB data drive.
Cooler : MSI MEG Coreliquid S360. An air cooler can't handle a 13900K well, and nowadays, AIO coolers are pretty stable.
Case : MSI MEG Prospect 700R. It has some fancy features, such as the LCD on top of it, and it's officially verified to support for the Z790 Godlike.
Keyboard : ASUS ROG Azoth (ROG NX Red Switches). I did some modifications on it.
Mouse : ASUS ROG Harpe Ace Aim Lab Edition. I used the G502 (both wired and wireless) for years, and it served me well, but I just want something lighter.
Monitor : MSI G274QPF-QD. 2K resolution and 144Hz refresh rate. I would say it's perfect for coding, reading and gaming.
